attributes.action: Ban the fireworks and their use at home.
attributes.additional_details: Because is the only institution to stop people abusing the fireworks and putting in danger their neighbours and pets wellbeing. Thank you.
attributes.background: Moat of the people are abusing the use of fireworks in their own home which is quite disturbing for pets and babies. I would like that government to ban the use of fireworks at home, and make them available in safe places only for Bonfire Night and NEW YEAR DAY. Thank you.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

Make it illegal for fireworks to be set off on days other than Nov 5 and Dec 31: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559397
